channel.title: Man of Tomorrow on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Man of Tomorrow on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: James Gunn Teases ‘Superman’ Sequel Plot, Aiming to Start Filming in April 2026
item.description: “It is a story about Lex Luthor and Superman having to work together to a certain degree against a much, much bigger threat,” the writer-director revealed of the upcoming film.

item.title: James Gunn Teases ‘Superman’ Sequel Plot, Aiming to Start Filming in April 2026
item.description: “It is a story about Lex Luthor and Superman having to work together to a certain degree against a much, much bigger threat,” the writer-director revealed of the upcoming film.

item.title: ‘Superman’ Sequel ‘Man of Tomorrow’ Is the Story of Superman and Lex Luthor Teaming Up Against a ‘Much Bigger Threat’; Filming Eyes April 2026 Start
item.description: James Gunn appeared on Howard Stern’s SiriusXM radio and said “we’re starting to shoot” the “Superman” sequel “Man of Tomorrow” in April 2026 or so. War
